entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:41 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
